information: The company SITTER BAU GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1901, which operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry industry. It also operates in the Structural work, Finishing work, Public works contractors, and Railways - laying and maintenance industries. It is based in Berg, Germany.
